name: Titanium.App.iOS.SearchableIndex
summary: The SearchableIndex module is used to add or remove Ti.App.iOS.SearchableItem objects from the device search index.

methods.name: addToDefaultSearchableIndex
methods.summary: Adds an array of Titanium.App.iOS.SearchableItem objects to the default search index.

parameters.name: Array
parameters.summary: Array of Titanium.App.iOS.SearchableItem objects to be added to the default search index.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to invoke on success or failure of adding the array Titanium.App.iOS.SearchableItem object to the default search index.

methods.name: deleteAllSearchableItemByDomainIdenifiers
methods.summary: Removes search items based on an array of domain identifiers.

parameters.name: Array
parameters.summary: Array of domain identifiers to be removed from the default search index.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to invoke on success or failure of removing search items from the default search index.

methods.name: deleteAllSearchableItems
methods.summary: Removes all search items added by the application.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to invoke on success or failure of deleting all search items.

methods.name: deleteSearchableItemsByIdentifiers
methods.summary: Removes search items based on an array of identifiers.

parameters.name: Array
parameters.summary: Array of identifiers to be removed from the default search index.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Function to invoke on success or failure of removing search items from the default search index.

methods.name: isSupported
methods.summary: Indicates whether indexing is supported by the device.
